cn.hutool.core.lang

类 Assert

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.hutool.core.lang.Assert

  • public class Assert
extends java.lang.Object
    断言
    断言某些对象或值是否符合规定，否则抛出异常。经常用于做变量检查
    作者:
    Looly

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Assert()

       Assert.isFalse(i < 0, "The value must be greater than zero");

       Assert.isNull(value, "The value must be null");

       Assert.isTrue(i > 0, "The value must be greater than zero");

      断言给定数组是否不包含null元素，如果数组为空或 null将被认为不包含 
       Assert.noNullElements(array);

       Assert.noNullElements(array, "The array must have non-null elements");

      • isTrue

        public static void isTrue(boolean expression,
          java.lang.String errorMsgTemplate,
          java.lang.Object... params)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        断言是否为真，如果为 false 抛出 IllegalArgumentException 异常
         Assert.isTrue(i > 0, "The value must be greater than zero");
        参数:
        expression - 波尔值
        errorMsgTemplate - 错误抛出异常附带的消息模板，变量用{}代替
        params - 参数列表
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if expression is false

        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if expression is false

        public static void isNull(java.lang.Object object,
          java.lang.String errorMsgTemplate,
          java.lang.Object... params)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        断言对象是否为null ，如果不为null 抛出IllegalArgumentException 异常 
         Assert.isNull(value, "The value must be null");
        参数:
        object - 被检查的对象
        errorMsgTemplate - 消息模板，变量使用{}表示
        params - 参数列表
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the object is not null

      • notNull

        public static <T> T notNull(T object,
            java.lang.String errorMsgTemplate,
            java.lang.Object... params)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        断言对象是否不为null ，如果为null 抛出IllegalArgumentException 异常 Assert that an object is not null . 
         Assert.notNull(clazz, "The class must not be null");
        类型参数:
        T - 被检查对象泛型类型
        参数:
        object - 被检查对象
        errorMsgTemplate - 错误消息模板，变量使用{}表示
        params - 参数
        返回:
        被检查后的对象
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the object is null

         Assert.notNull(clazz);

        T - 被检查对象类型
        参数:

        返回:
        非空对象
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the object is null

      • notEmpty

        public static java.lang.String notEmpty(java.lang.String text,
                        java.lang.String errorMsgTemplate,
                        java.lang.Object... params)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        检查给定字符串是否为空，为空抛出 IllegalArgumentException 
         Assert.notEmpty(name, "Name must not be empty");
        参数:
        text - 被检查字符串
        errorMsgTemplate - 错误消息模板，变量使用{}表示
        params - 参数
        返回:
        非空字符串
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - 被检查字符串为空
        另请参阅:
        StrUtil.isNotEmpty(CharSequence)

      • notContain

        public static java.lang.String notContain(java.lang.String textToSearch,

                          java.lang.String errorMsgTemplate,
                          java.lang.Object... params)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        textToSearch - 被搜索的字符串

        params - 参数列表
        返回:
        被检查的子串
        抛出:

      • isInstanceOf

        public static <T> T isInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                 T obj)
        断言给定对象是否是给定类的实例 
         Assert.instanceOf(Foo.class, foo);
        类型参数:
        T - 被检查对象泛型类型
        参数:
        type - 被检查对象匹配的类型
        obj - 被检查对象
        返回:
        被检查的对象
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the object is not an instance of clazz
        另请参阅:
        Class.isInstance(Object)

      • isInstanceOf

        public static <T> T isInstanceOf(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                 T obj,

        被检查对象

        另请参阅:
        Class.isInstance(Object)

      • isAssignable

        public static void isAssignable(java.lang.Class<?> superType,
                java.lang.Class<?> subType)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Assert that superType.isAssignableFrom(subType) is true. 
         Assert.isAssignable(Number.class, myClass);
        参数:
        superType - the super type to check
        subType - the sub type to check
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the classes are not assignable

      • isAssignable

        public static void isAssignable(java.lang.Class<?> superType,
                java.lang.Class<?> subType,
                java.lang.String errorMsgTemplate,
                java.lang.Object... params)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Assert that superType.isAssignableFrom(subType) is true. 
         Assert.isAssignable(Number.class, myClass);
        参数:
        superType - the super type to check against
        subType - the sub type to check
        errorMsgTemplate - 异常时的消息模板
        params - 参数列表
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the classes are not assignable

      • state

        public static void state(boolean expression,
         java.lang.String errorMsgTemplate,
         java.lang.Object... params)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Assert a boolean expression, throwing IllegalStateException if the test result is false. Call isTrue if you wish to throw IllegalArgumentException on an assertion failure. 
         Assert.state(id == null, "The id property must not already be initialized");
        参数:
        expression - a boolean expression
        errorMsgTemplate - 异常时的消息模板
        params - 参数列表
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if expression is false

      • state

        public static void state(boolean expression)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Assert a boolean expression, throwing IllegalStateException if the test result is false.

        Call isTrue(boolean) if you wish to throw IllegalArgumentException on an assertion failure. 

         Assert.state(id == null);
        参数:
        expression - a boolean expression
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the supplied expression is false
